Document.Title: Code: Error Handling Base Structure on the Procedure Level.

Content:
Function MyFunction () As Integer
'
'NOTE: This procedure contains line break characters
'for readability. These characters are not supported
'in Access Basic.
'
    '
    'Write any local declarations here. 
    '
    On Error GoTo MyFunction_Err
    '
    'Write code here.
    '
MyFunction_Exit:
    '
    'Write any "clean up" lines here.
    '
    Exit Function

MyFunction_Err:
    Select Case Err
        '
        'Enter known error number cases here.
        '
        Case Else
            MsgBox Err & ": " & Error$(Err), 16, _
                "MyFunction Error"
            Resume MyFunction_Exit
    End Select
End Function
